verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Out of the depths to the glory above, I have been lifted in wonderful love; From ev'ry fetter my spirit is free-- For Jesus has lifted me!

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Jesus has lifted me! Jesus has lifted me! Out of the night into glorious light, Yes, Jesus has lifted me!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Out of the world into heavenly rest, Into the land of the ransomed and blest; There in the glory with Him I shall be-- For Jesus has lifted me!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Out of myself into Him I adore, There to abide in His loved evermore; Thro' endless ages His glory to see-- My Jesus has lifted me!
